title: Lower Priority Queue Bad Idea!!
body:
Lower Priority Queue, hmm lets get started, i strongly believe its a bad idea because people who crashed have to wait 5 mins or more just for crashing,
like me for example i crashed twice both of my games now i have to wait 20 god dam mins its so annoying fix it plz !!!
it will mean alot.

replies.body:
Only people who have been placed into low priority queue are complaining about it.

I think that means it's working.
